snippet.title: Dr. Robert Cantu on Management and Treatment of Post-Concussion Syndrome
snippet.description:
Concussion Legacy Foundation co-founder and medical director Dr. Robert Cantu provides a detailed breakdown on how to manage and treat Post-Concussion Syndrome, and provides advice for those who are recovering from PCS while sheltered in place or social distancing during the COVID-19 outbreak.

This segment was part of the Concussion Legacy Foundation’s March 28 webinar, Managing Post-Concussion Syndrome in the Time of Coronavirus.

Dr. Robert Cantu is Medical Director and Director of Clinical Research at the Cantu Concussion Center at Emerson Hospital in Concord, MA.

Watch the full webinar:
https://youtu.be/Q7arPR9Pvb0

To learn more about PCS, visit the following resources:

Sign up for the PCS Newsletter – https://bit.ly/39xBPk9

What is PCS? https://concussionfoundation.org/PCS-resources/what-is-PCS

PCS Treatments - https://concussionfoundation.org/PCS-resources/PCS-treatments

Coping with PCS - https://concussionfoundation.org/PCS-resources/coping-with-PCS

Can we help you as you battle your symptoms? Submit a HelpLine Request: https://concussionfoundation.org/helpline

Follow us on Facebook - https://bit.ly/2LOfF2r

Follow us on Twitter - https://bit.ly/2LMfp47

Follow us on Instagram - https://bit.ly/2xwXFGS

Follow us on LinkedIn - https://bit.ly/2J5sQdy
